A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I just made an account because of how disappointing this movie is.  Entire plotlines are rendered irrelevant over the course of the movie.  A major villain is killed off before even getting a backstory in a horrible anti-climax.  Characters we love like Luke act completely unlike themselves and I just don't see where they go from here.  I don't think a movie has ever disappointed me more.  And this is my honest opinion.  Just because someone doesn't like this movie doesn't make him or her a \"white supremacist\" or a \"misogynist\" as Wired wrote.
